35#include <sys/cdefs.h>
36__RCSID("$NetBSD: nb_name.c,v 1.2 2013/12/25 22:03:15 christos Exp $");
37
38#include <sys/param.h>
39#include <sys/socket.h>
40#include <sys/endian.h>
41
42#include <ctype.h>
43#include <err.h>
44#include <errno.h>
45#include <stdio.h>
46#include <stdlib.h>
47#include <string.h>
48
49#include <netsmb/netbios.h>
50#include <netsmb/smb_lib.h>
51#include <netsmb/nb_lib.h>
52
53int
54nb_snballoc(int namelen, struct sockaddr_nb **dst)
55{
56 struct sockaddr_nb *snb;
57 int slen;
58
59 slen = namelen + sizeof(*snb) - sizeof(snb->snb_name);
60 snb = malloc(slen);
61 if (snb == NULL)
62 return ENOMEM;
63 bzero(snb, slen);
64 snb->snb_family = AF_NETBIOS;
65 snb->snb_len = slen;
66 *dst = snb;
67 return 0;
68}
69
70void
71nb_snbfree(struct sockaddr *snb)
72{
73 free(snb);
74}
75
76/*
77 * Create a full NETBIOS address
78 */
79int
80nb_sockaddr(struct sockaddr *peer, struct nb_name *np,
81 struct sockaddr_nb **dst)
82
83{
84 struct sockaddr_nb *snb;
85 int nmlen, error;
86
87 if (peer && (peer->sa_family != AF_INET && peer->sa_family != AF_IPX))
88 return EPROTONOSUPPORT;
89 nmlen = nb_name_len(np);
90 if (nmlen < NB_ENCNAMELEN)
91 return EINVAL;
92 error = nb_snballoc(nmlen, &snb);
93 if (error)
94 return error;
95 if (nmlen != nb_name_encode(np, snb->snb_name))
96 printf("a bug somewhere in the nb_name* code\n");
97 if (peer)
98 memcpy(&snb->snb_tran, peer, peer->sa_len);
99 *dst = snb;
100 return 0;
101}
102
103int
104nb_name_len(struct nb_name *np)
105{
106 u_char *name;
107 int len, sclen;
108
109 len = 1 + NB_ENCNAMELEN;
110 if (np->nn_scope == NULL)
111 return len + 1;
112 sclen = 0;
113 for (name = np->nn_scope; *name; name++) {
114 if (*name == '.') {
115 sclen = 0;
116 } else {
117 if (sclen < NB_MAXLABLEN) {
118 sclen++;
119 len++;
120 }
121 }
122 }
123 return len + 1;
124}
125
126int
127nb_encname_len(const char *str)
128{
129 const u_char *cp = (const u_char *)str;
130 int len, blen;
131
132 if ((cp[0] & 0xc0) == 0xc0)
133 return -1; /* first two bytes are offset to name */
134
135 len = 1;
136 for (;;) {
137 blen = *cp;
138 if (blen++ == 0)
139 break;
140 len += blen;
141 cp += blen;
142 }
143 return len;
144}
145
146#define NBENCODE(c) (htole16((u_short)(((u_char)(c) >> 4) | \
147 (((u_char)(c) & 0xf) << 8)) + 0x4141))
148
149static void
150memsetw(char *dst, int n, u_short word)
151{
152 for(; n > 0; n--, dst += 2)
153 memcpy(dst, &word, 2);
154}
155
156int
157nb_name_encode(struct nb_name *np, u_char *dst)
158{
159 u_char *name, *plen;
160 u_char *cp = dst;
161 int i, lblen;
162 u_int16_t ch;
163
164 *cp++ = NB_ENCNAMELEN;
165 name = np->nn_name;
166 if (name[0] == '*' && name[1] == 0) {
167 ch = NBENCODE('*');
168 memcpy(cp, &ch, 2);
169 memsetw(cp + 2, NB_NAMELEN - 1, NBENCODE(' '));
170 cp += NB_ENCNAMELEN;
171 } else {
172 for (i = 0; *name && i < NB_NAMELEN - 1; i++, cp += 2, name++) {
173 ch = NBENCODE(toupper(*name));
174 memcpy(cp, &ch, 2);
175 }
176 i = NB_NAMELEN - i - 1;
177 if (i > 0) {
178 memsetw(cp, i, NBENCODE(' '));
179 cp += i * 2;
180 }
181 ch = NBENCODE(np->nn_type);
182 memcpy(cp, &ch, 2);
183 cp += 2;
184 }
185 *cp = 0;
186 if (np->nn_scope == NULL || *np->nn_scope == 0)
187 return nb_encname_len(dst);
188 plen = cp++;
189 lblen = 0;
190 for (name = np->nn_scope; ; name++) {
191 if (*name == '.' || *name == 0) {
192 *plen = lblen;
193 plen = cp++;
194 *plen = 0;
195 if (*name == 0)
196 break;
197 } else {
198 if (lblen < NB_MAXLABLEN) {
199 *cp++ = *name;
200 lblen++;
201 }
202 }
203 }
204 return nb_encname_len(dst);
205}
